REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0682 reute u f BC-U.K.-CLEARS-CONS-GOLD 03-03 0070

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. CLEARS CONS GOLD U.S. PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: The U.K. Trade Department said it would not refer Consolidated Goldfields Plc's <CGLD.L> purchase of <American Aggregates Corp> to the Monopolies Commission. Cons Gold said last month that its <ARC America Corp> unit had agreed to buy the Ohio-based company for 30.625 dlrs a share cash, or 242 mln dlrs, in a deal recommended by the Aggregates board. REUTER
